application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The submitted details relating to the details of the landscaping proposals pursuant to condition 18 of planning permission 230021VAR dated 16/11/2023 are deemed to be insufficient and do not meet the requirements of the condition. The proposal would therefore fail to comply with Policies 5.10, 5.11 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and Policies G4, G6, G7, T3 and T4 of the London Plan (2021).
description: Details of the landscaping proposals in pursuant to condition 18 of planning application Ref:  230021VAR dated 16/11/2023 for 'Minor material amendment (S.73) to vary condition no.2 (approved plans), resulting in an increase of five co-living rooms, new roof terraces, and associated internal layout rearrangement and external appearance changes and to reword condition no.29 (accessible units) to a compliance condition in pursuant to planning permission reference 221993VAR dated 21/12/2022 for: Part three, part four, part five, part six-storey building with two basement levels to form a fifty-nine room, fifty-nine person co-living property (Use Class Sui Generis); and associated amenity, cycle parking, waste storage, and vehicle parking spaces (following demolition of existing buildings)'.'
